title: Cassidy Low
author: Cassidy Low
content: Paylights is a payment aggregator for high risk destinations such as:Â - Casino- Betting- Forex- Crypto- Any white label destinationsAvailable GEOs: - Asia (India, Bangladesh, etc.)- Africa - Latin America- Europe Continuous integration of new countries, also based on customer needs.What we offer :- Payment processing platform (payment aggregation, settlement, bulk payments, currency exchange, etc.)- Attractive tariffs (customized offer - depending on payment methods and transaction volume)- Reliable round-the-clock support- Variety of supported payment methods (you can accept funds from e-wallets, cryptocurrencies, etc.)- API for integrations- Implemented fraud protection (low risk of account blocking)- Low risk of account lockout (fraud/security protection implemented)- Conversion of funds into popular cryptocurrencies is possible- Fast exchange of funds Interest rate : Discussed individually for each GEO and client, we have very flexible terms.Our contacts:PAYLIGHTS.COMCONTACTS@PAYLIGHTS.COMTELEGRAM: @PAYLIGHTS23Our Managers Telegram:@andy_towner@tomas_allen12@morgan_hills_p[/size][/font]
